thread.title: Aldi sets new minimum price for milk amid farmers' calls for fairer deal
thread.title_full: Aldi sets new minimum price for milk amid farmers' calls for fairer deal

author: Julia Bradshaw
title: Aldi sets new minimum price for milk amid farmers' calls for fairer deal
text: Retail and Consumer Aldi sets new minimum price for milk amid farmers' calls for fairer deal The discount grocer has promised to pay processors 28p per litre for milk it sells in its UK stores Aldi has agreed to pay a minimum price for milk Photo: Getty Images
